tool.name: Identify similar conformers
tool.command: nohup /opt/ignite/bin/ignite.sh config/lira_ignite.xml & export HOME=`pwd` && #if $ligand.ext == 'pdb': ln -s $ligand ligand.pdb && #else python /opt/ignite/scripts/convert_sdf_to_pdb.py $ligand ligand.pdb && #end if python -m esp_dnn.predict -m ligand -i . -o . && esp-surface-generator ligand.pdb.pqr ligand.pdb.tmesh && sh-coeff-calculator . && echo 'y' | /opt/ignite/bin/control.sh --set-state ACTIVE_READ_ONLY && ln -s ${database_select.fields.path}/* /opt/ignite/storage && micromamba run -n lirasearch python /opt/ignite/scripts/lira_search_sdf.py --in_file rid_coeffs.csv --out_file output --database /opt/ignite/storage/rid_coeffs.csv --ignite_address 127.0.0.1:10800 --num_results $num_results --out_folder search_results && micromamba run -n lirasearch python /opt/ignite/scripts/lira_super.py --target ligand.pdb --folder search_results && cat search_results/*rotated.sdf >> '$output_sdf'
tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
**What this tool does**
Identify similar conformers to an input ligand, based on predicting the electrostatic potential (ESP) using a deep neural network and computing spherical harmonic coefficients.
